page.title: 14Kingsway Thursday Club
page.content: The Community Action Group Thursday club in Kingsway Clifton is a special club meeting for young people in the Kingsway area of Clifton.This is an area of council housing built just after the war to cater for slum clearance. The children and young people go to the club as a break from home and their parents and for somewhere to go in the evenings. They can play snooker, table tennis and football or just talk and listen to records. The Centre is staffed by volunteers and two students from St.Johns teacher training college in York. Patrick Allen and Natasza Kielbinska recently won Â£1000 and a Dettol Caring Award for their work at the Centre. They intend to use the money on equipment. The award was presented by Princess Anne on the B.B.C. Pebble Mill programme in May.
